@therealonanel @nasajpl This is a new image of the "Hand of God" nebula that includes data from NASA's newest X-ray observatory.
@iammcreyes @nasajpl It's a cloud that happens to look like a hand. It was formed when a star exploded, expelling material.

@pmwalters The iron emission is from material circulating right outside the BH event horizon, not from material inside (you can't see that)
@Josuemf8 The speed of light is not variable, it is constant.
@krishna1306 The BH spin is likely due to the conditions that created it, and from angular momentum from what it has eaten since then.
@pmwalters The evidence for the BH spin comes from measuring the iron line shape, and matching it to predicts from General Relativity

text: @daviest @nasajpl @esa Black holes don't rotate like spinning tops so scientists say the spin energy is 84 percent the theoretical max.

text: The mast has deployed! We are on our way to getting the best views yet of high-energy X-rays in our universe!
NuSTAR team preps for mast deployment at Caltech's science operations center. Mission control is at UC Berkeley. http://t.co/FCNUWngB
The mast deployment takes about 26 minutes. See animation at http://t.co/LFcStTak
NuSTAR's mast, first of its kind for a space telescope, will begin inching out of a canister today at 10:40 a.m. PDT (1:40 a.m. EDT).
@mbccohen @nasagoddard We'll tweet the news once it's confirmed the mast has deployed. And a status update will be posted to NuSTAR sites.
NuSTAR's mast will separate the telescope's mirrors from its detectors so that it can see! Read more in our press kit http://t.co/1BSVE7r6
The NuSTAR team is getting ready to deploy its school bus-sized mast, tomorrow June 21 at 10:40 a.m. Pacific Time (1:40 p.m. Eastern).

text: NuSTAR team is getting their sleep, preparing for launch tomorrow. Live coverage on June 13, 7 a.m. PDT (10 a.m. EDT) http://t.co/RcZZ9vuB

NuSTAR team members Yunjin Kim and Jill Burnham pose with the Stargazer aircraft down in sunny Kwajalein Atoll. http://t.co/TBTwaxmg

Video feeds and other info from Kwajalein! http://t.co/bC9e8ZVW
